interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: L'ANGE HAIR Detangling Comb Brush | Lightweight, Comfortable, Non-slip Design | Easy Glide, Smooth, Snag-Free Comb | Blush
Review Date: 2022/08/01
Store: L'ANGE HAIR
Average Rating: 4.6
Product Details: {'Brand': "L'ANGE HAIR", 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Color': 'Blush', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '11.1 x 3.5 x 0.51 inches; 1.76 Ounces', 'Item model number': '2335', 'UPC': '810108190264', 'Manufacturer': "L'ANGE HAIR"}
Review Text: Being honest, I only got this because it was such a pretty shade of pink, however, I was very surprised by the quality. The teeth are wide and very sturdy. None of them have broken off nor bent while in use. The teeth are also polished, so they brush smoothly and gently detangles hair. This comb is definitely meant for thick and coarse hair.
Review Title: Sturdy wide-tooth comb
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Blonde Tape in Hair Extensions Human Hair 20pcs/50g 14in Tape in Platinum Blonde Hair Extensions Remy Human Hair Straight For Women With Salon Style
LaaVoo
{'Brand': 'LaaVoo', 'Color': 'Platinum blonde', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Extension Length': '14 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Product Dimensions': '14 x 1 x 1 inches; 1.76 Ounces'}
These hair extensions are gorgeous and the hair itself is good quality. My only complaint is how weak the tape is. I’ve only had them on for a couple days before the first one fell off. I’ve never had tape extensions fall off this soon. It seems this is anticipated as the box comes with replacement tapes.
Soft hair, weak tape
Ultimate Essentials Kit
{'Brand': 'Olaplex', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Hair Type': 'Damaged', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Product Benefits': 'Repairs, Strengthens & Protects hair. Restores texture. Adds shine.', 'Product Dimensions': '6 x 1.38 x 4.88 inches; 7.83 Ounces', 'UPC': '850018802420', 'Manufacturer': 'Olaplex'}
The kit comes with No. 0, 3, 4, 5, and 8. No. 1 and 2 are only for professional use, thus why they are not included. Like how the numbers imply, start with No.0 and work upward. Everything included in the kit has little-to-no scent. My favorite has to be No.3. I saw the most change in my hair after using it. Despite my hair being damaged, No.3 made it appear healthier. The items in this kid are small, making them perfect for traveling.
Hair repair kit
L'ANGE HAIR Exfolier Purifying Scalp Scrub | Gentle Cleansing Salt Scrub for Scalp | Helps Exfoliate, Balance, and Hydrate Scalp | Free of Parabens and Silicones
L'ANGE HAIR
{'Brand': "L'ANGE HAIR", 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Product Benefits': 'Targets buildup and impurities, nourishes hair and scalp, gently cleanses and exfoliates, soothes and restores bodyTargets buildup and impurities, nourishes hair and scalp, gently cleanses and exfoliates, soothes and restores body  See more', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Product Dimensions': '2.9 x 2.9 x 2.5 inches; 6.38 Ounces', 'UPC': '810108190721', 'Manufacturer': "L'ANGE HAIR"}
I liked using L’ange’s exfoliar purifying scalp scrub. It helped to get rid of buildup while also gently exfoliating the scalp. It’s paraben and silicone-free, but it’s not sulfate-free. I would be careful to not over-use this product, since sulfates can really dry and damage your hair.
Read the instructions, use for no longer than 2 minutes!
Hempz Triple Moisture Hydrating Herbal Hand Creme, 4 oz
Hempz
['We put hemp seed oil into everything we make, so you get vitamin E, amino acids, and omega fatty acids in every squeeze or swipe.']
{'Product Dimensions': '2.13 x 1.38 x 7.25 inches; 4 Ounces', 'Item model number': '110-2758-03', 'UPC': '676280046580', 'Manufacturer': 'Hempz'}
I got this for my mother, who has arthritis and it’s helped her tremendously with her pain. The hand cream smells like citrus, and it’s strong enough to cover up the hemp seed oil smell. It’s also moisturizing and a little bit greasy when it’s first applied. It absorbs well into the skin, despite how thick the cream is.
Citrus scent, hides the hemp seed oil smell very well!
L'ANGE HAIR Detangling Comb Brush | Lightweight, Comfortable, Non-slip Design | Easy Glide, Smooth, Snag-Free Comb | Blush
L'ANGE HAIR
{'Brand': "L'ANGE HAIR", 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Color': 'Blush', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '11.1 x 3.5 x 0.51 inches; 1.76 Ounces', 'Item model number': '2335', 'UPC': '810108190264', 'Manufacturer': "L'ANGE HAIR"}
Being honest, I only got this because it was such a pretty shade of pink, however, I was very surprised by the quality. The teeth are wide and very sturdy. None of them have broken off nor bent while in use. The teeth are also polished, so they brush smoothly and gently detangles hair. This comb is definitely meant for thick and coarse hair.
Sturdy wide-tooth comb
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Hair Extensions Preference:** The user favors high-quality human hair extensions that blend seamlessly, particularly in platinum blonde shades and straight styles.

- **Quality Concerns:** They prioritize product durability and the effectiveness of attachment methods, focusing on performance and reliability.

- **Rating Behavior:** The user typically values quality and expresses balanced evaluations. They show disappointment when products fail to meet expectations, maintaining an average rating of 3.0.

- **Replacement Options:** Their proactive nature seeks solutions for product issues, with a clear preference for brands offering replacement options.

- **Hair Care Products:** Recently, they have shown interest in enhancing hair health and appearance. A hair repair kit improved their hair texture, and a scalp scrub purchase aligns with their commitment to quality, prioritizing natural ingredients.

- **Caution with Ingredients:** They are cautious about specific ingredients, particularly sulfates, believing these negatively impact hair health.

- **Skincare Interest:** Their focus has expanded to high-quality skincare, demonstrated by purchasing a hand cream that effectively alleviated discomfort for a family member, showcasing their preference for effective and well-formulated products.

- **Combing Tools:** The user recently acquired a detangling comb after being drawn to its aesthetic appeal but was pleasantly surprised by its sturdy quality, emphasizing a trend toward functional and aesthetically pleasing accessories for hair care.

Overall, the user values high-quality products for both hair and skincare that enhance aesthetics, ensure reliability, and promote overall health and beauty.
